alert.note: Alert for Imperial (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 4:49PM PDT until August 13 at 5:30PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Imperial County in southeastern California... * Until 530 PM PDT. * At 448 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Calexico, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... El Centro, Calexico, Holtville, Mt. Signal, Bonds Corner and Heber. This includes the following highways... CA Interstate 8 between mile markers 32 and 55. CA Route 111 between mile markers 1 and 11. CA Route 86 between mile markers 1 and 8. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
